Course Name: RESEARCH AND WRITINGS IN EDUCATIONAL STUDIES
Description:
This course presents and integrates the role of professionals in the Education, Health and Human Services fields
 as they attempt to meet the needs of individuals in diverse environments.

Prerequisites: Educational Studies (EDST) majors; and senior standing; and specialapproval.
